rules_text:
Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
When a creature scavenges this creature, it gains flying, deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
Scavenge {1}{W}{B} [i]({1}{W}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
